name: Telehealth: Inclusive Design with Mature First-Gen Immigrants in Mind
description:
This package’s purpose is to provide a starter guide to make it easier to design telehealth products for an overlooked user of telehealth. The package includes:


• A bias checklist

• User personas

• Telehealth consumer journey

• Identification of the main barriers for the overlooked user

• Example solutions for a simple doctor visit

• Resource list to learn more


To read full article: https://bootcamp.uxdesign.cc/designing-telehealth-for-first-generation-immigrants-1a93752b1afc
